explains: n. 荣誉；荣誉称号授予仪式；连谱号；称赞

sentences.en: The Nobel Prize has become the ultimate accolade in the sciences.
sentences.cn: 诺贝尔奖已成为科学界的最高荣誉。

sentences.en: The accolade, awarded by the magazaine Total Politics, goes to the bizarre video cover of the Bucks Fizz classic "Making your mind up".
sentences.cn: 由 Total Politics 颁发的荣誉，授予给了 Bucks Fizz 怪异的古典音乐《振作起来》的视频封面。

sentences.en: Strangely, the yen may be the more deserving of that accolade.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，日元或许更配得上这个荣誉称号。
